saitMLS.persistence.property

Class CommercialPropertyBroker

  • java.lang.Object
    • saitMLS.persistence.property.CommercialPropertyBroker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Broker

    public class CommercialPropertyBroker
extends java.lang.Object
implements Broker
    An implementation of the Broker interface that regulates the persistence of commercial properties.

    • Method Detail

      • getBroker

        public static CommercialPropertyBroker getBroker()
        Method to create an instance of CommercialPropertyBroker
        Returns:
        CommercialPropertyBroker

      • persist

        public boolean persist(java.lang.Object o)
        Method to add commercial properties to the Linked List database. If the property's member id is zero then the commercial property is assigned the next id in the sequence of id's. If the commercial property already exists then the old record is overwritten with the new information.
        Specified by:
        persist in interface Broker
        Parameters:
        o - - commercial property object being added or updated.
        Returns:
        a boolean true if the add or update was successful and false if it was not.

      • remove

        public boolean remove(java.lang.Object o)
        Method to remove a CommercialProperty from the data base. The method returns true if CommercialProperty was removed and false if no CommercialProperty was removed.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface Broker
        Parameters:
        o - - the CommercialProperty that is being removed.
        Returns:
        a boolean to confirm the success or failure of the removal.

      • search

        public java.util.List search(java.lang.String item,
                    java.lang.String type)
        Method to search the database for matching items. The search will search based on legal description, id, quadrant or price. The search using price will return any records with a price equal to or less than the one provided to the search. The value of item should be the value that is being searched for i.e. . "2519S1128-30", "legal description". The type should be the type of search required and the valid types are "legal description", "id", "quadrant" and "price".
        Specified by:
        search in interface Broker
        Parameters:
        item - legal description, id quadrant or price being searched for.
        type - is the type of required search and valid types could be "legal description", "id", "quadrant" or "price".
        Returns:
        a List containing the results of the search. In this case an ArrayList.

      • closeBroker

        public void closeBroker()
        Method to release resources allocated to the broker and save all modified data. NOTE if this method is not called modified data may be lost
        Specified by:
        closeBroker in interface Broker

      • loadCommercialPropertyLinkedList

        private void loadCommercialPropertyLinkedList()
        Method fills a Singly Linked List as a data structure to store commercial property information in a object format. This method is then used to create a serialized file if no serialized file for the commercial property currently exists.

      • findHighestCurrentId

        private void findHighestCurrentId()
        Method to search for the last highest id assigned and save it in the class level attribute nextId.

      • loadSerializedFile

        private void loadSerializedFile()
        Method loads the serialized linked list file to propertyList attribute.

      • saveSerializedFile

        private void saveSerializedFile()
        Method saves the propertyList to a serialized linked list file.
